## About This Site

This is a research website built with [Quarto](https://quarto.org/) and hosted on GitHub Pages. It features my research and design reports, including interactive data visualizations, reproducible analyses, and references.

## Recent Work

### Interactive Analysis

Explore data with interactive visualizations built using ggplot2 and plotly. See the [Analysis](analysis.qmd) page for examples.

All code and data are available for download. Check the [Data & Code](data.qmd) section for reproducibility materials.
